content:
Hi all, I am Andy Thomason, author of much of the Playstation 3 compiler, especially the SSA optimiser and SIMD support.
I'm teaching Rust now, but taught advanced C++ for many years before that.

I would like to help to get the SIMD support over the line and into stable but it seems challenging to get in touch.
Give me a ping if you are involved with this.
Hi, I'm not involved with this (or any other rust official projects) but you should watch this repository rust-lang/stdsimd and this zulip #project-portable-simd.
